T02D3464:118a-5: drug pa'i lnga pa'i sa bon lnga pa'i dbyangs kyis nye bar mdzes pa stong pa'i lhas mnan pa /
T02D3464:118a-6: de las de bzhin du skyes pa'i dpal ldan dkar
T02D3464:118a-7: po 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang
T02D3464:118a-8: ldan pa / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3464:118a-9: phyag gnyis pa g-yon na autpa la bsnams pa /
T02D3464:118a-10: g-yas pa rol pa'i stabs kyis seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3464:118a-11: bdag nyid gzhon nu'i skur bsam par bya'o //
T02D3464:118a-12: 'di'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo dang ming med dag bkab pa'o //
T02D3464:118a-17: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
